meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tom Hudak Michael Rankins Jack Koenig Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #880.

td.p: Tom Hudak, a factory worker from Hudson Falls, New York
Michael Rankins, a customer service represenative from Rohnert Park, California
Jack Koenig, an actor and househusband from New York City, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $23,599)

tr.td: (Alex: Was that a good year?)
BIOLOGY
STARTS WITH "R"
FOOTBALL
PIES
SHANGHAI MOVIES
